channel.title: python on Andrey Akinshin
channel.description: Recent content in python on Andrey Akinshin

item.title: When Python's Mann-Whitney U test returns extremely distorted p-values
item.description: In the previous post, I have discussed a huge difference between p-values evaluated via the R implementation of the Mann-Whitney U test between the exact and asymptotic implementations. This issue is not unique only to R, it is relevant for other statistical packages in other languages as well. In this post, we review this problem in the Python package SciPy.
